description:
Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

This is an official Mobile Ordering application of Domino’s Pizza  Sri Lanka. It allows you to view and use the complete menu and content for the purpose of placing an order directly at Domino’s Pizza Restaurants. The application accepts all the valid coupons introduced by Domino’s Pizza  Sri Lanka respectively. The delivery promise of 30 minute guarantee is applicable for all orders placed through this Mobile Application. For more details please refer to information and T&C section while placing your order with the mobile application. T&C Apply.

Keeta – The World’s Leading Food Delivery Service
Craving pizza, fried chicken, sushi, or something new? We’ve got you covered! Whether you’re in the mood for indulgent treats or healthy choices like fresh salads and light meals, Keeta delivers your favourites straight to your door. 

Why Choose Keeta?
1.Easy to Use – Order in seconds!
2.Daily Deals – Free delivery and discounts on every order!
3.Global Cuisines – Explore various tasty options.
4.On-time Promise – Your food arrives fresh and fast. 

How It Works:
1.Download Keeta and pick a restaurant.
2.Select your dishes and checkout.
3.Sit back and enjoy!
The official Pizza Hut Sri Lanka mobile ordering App for iOS enables you to order pizzas, pasta, appetizers, desserts and drinks more easily and efficiently.

Earn Rewards for Your Crepe Cravings! 
Dreaming of deliciousness? We've got you covered with our FREE Crepe Runner Loyalty App! Every purchase gets you closer to sweet (or savoury!) rewards, because who doesn't love a little extra crepe-y goodness?


ONE STOP SHOP FOR ALL THINGS CREPE
Our entire menu is at your fingertips! Signature crepes, sweet crepes, savoury crepes, signature blends, mojitos, or coffees- the choice is yours! Just scroll, tap, and get ready for happy taste buds.


ORDER AHEAD AND SKIP THE LINE
Feeling hangry? No worries. Order ahead directly from our app and grab your crepe from the nearest branch whenever you're ready. Speedy service, zen status - achieved!


BOX OR CONE - YOU DECIDE
Craving a crepe on the go? Cone it is. Saving it for later? Box it up. We cater to all your crepe-carrying needs. 


LIVE TRACKING, LESS WAITING
Track your crepe in real-time as it gets closer (or as you make your way to pick it up!). No more wondering, just pure crepe anticipation.


MORE POINTS = FREE CREPES
Whoop whoop! Earn points with every purchase and snag a free crepe once you hit 1,000! Because sharing the crepe love is what it's all about.
So, what are you waiting for? Download the app and join the Crepe Runner fun! It's the perfect way to fuel your next adventure (or Netflix marathon)


P.S. Got questions? Reach out to our awesome support crew at info@creperunner.lk. They're always happy to help!

developer: Talabat General Trading and Contracting Company
description:
Hey! Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app.

Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

"Pay online or in cash"
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

"Track your order from start to finish"
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

"Find exclusive deals"
Downloading the talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt.

Happy ordering.

Whether you’re chasing dreams, running meetings, or taking a break — Zomato is built for the ones who don’t slow down. Craving biryani between brainstorms? A cheesy burger after a long day? Or just a salad and chai to keep things steady? With lightning-fast delivery from over 3 lakh restaurants, your fuel is never far. Order in seconds, track every bite, and keep going. Hustle harder – we’ve got the food.

▪ Search and Discover Top Restaurants and Dishes
From butter chicken to sushi, dal makhani to dimsums – and legends like Domino’s, Pizza Hut, McDonald’s, Starbucks, and more – Zomato puts your cravings on speed dial. Just decisions, made easy.

▪ Access Restaurant Details
 Menus, ratings, reviews, photos – everything you need to decide fast and eat faster. Rate your meal to guide the next hungry hustler.

▪ Try Veg Mode
Veg Mode curates top vegetarian dishes, veg-only restaurants, and even veg-only delivery fleets. Clean eating with no compromise.

▪ Schedule Your Orders
 Time is currency. Lock in your lunch or dinner before the hunger hits. The scheduling feature lets you plan ahead and stay on track.

▪ Food on Train
 Even when you’re on the move, Zomato keeps up. Enter your PNR, pick your dish, and get your meal delivered to your seat at 130+ stations. No chaos, no compromises –  just food (and your schedule) right on track.

Smiles UAE is available for any mobile users in UAE. Join Smiles and start saving.


About Smiles

Smiles is e&'s full-service lifestyle SuperApp and one of the largest one-stop shops for the everyday needs of UAE residents and visitors. With 6,500 participating brands and over 15,000 partner outlets in the UAE, Smiles offers deals and rewards on food and grocery deliveries, home services booking, e& services as well as dining, shopping, entertainment, wellness and travel benefits, making it a premier lifestyle SuperApp.

Earn and redeem Smiles points on all transactions on food, grocery, home services, shopping, travel & more.

Looking for delicious food delivered to your doorstep? We've got you covered! Browse through our extensive selection of 12,000 plus restaurants to order your favorite dishes. 

Need to stock up on groceries? Smiles has got you covered there too! Order your grocery essentials on Smiles Market and 600+ more retailers.

Need help around the house? From home cleaning, handyman, salon and spa services to laundry and carwash, we have over 35 home services to help you tackle your to-do list.

Join the unlimited loop of savings with Smiles Unlimited. Get free delivery on food & grocery order, zero service fee on home services booking and unlimited Buy 1 Get 1 Free deals.

Download the Smiles app now and start savings journey. 

الإمارات متاحة لأي مستخدم للهواتف المحمولة في الإمارات العربية المتحدة. انضم إلى Smiles وابدأ في التوفير.

 
نبذة عن تطبيق Smiles


هو تطبيق e& اتصالات والمزيد المتكامل لنمط الحياة المتكامل وأحد أكبر المتاجر الشاملة لتلبية الاحتياجات اليومية لسكان دولة الإمارات وزوارها. مع مشاركة 6,500 علامة تجارية وأكثر من 15,000 منفذ شريك في دولة الإمارات، يقدم تطبيق Smiles عروض ومكافآت على توصيل الأكل والبقالة وحجز الخدمات المنزلية وخدمات إتصالات والمزيد، بالإضافة إلى مزايا إستلام الوجبات بنفسك والتسوق والترفيه والعافية والسفر، مما يجعله تطبيقًا متميزًا لنمط الحياة العصرية.
 

اكسب واستبدل نقاط Smiles على جميع المعاملات على الأكل والبقالة والخدمات المنزلية والتسوق والسفر والمزيد.
 

هل تبحث عن طعام لذيذ يتم توصيله إلى باب منزلك؟ تصفح مجموعتنا الواسعة التي تضم أكثر من 12000 مطعم لطلب وجباتك المفضلة.
 

هل تحتاج إلى تخزين البقالة؟ وفرنا لك كل ما تحتاجه! اطلب مستلزمات البقالة من ماركت Smiles  وأكثر من 600 متجر آخر.
 

هل تحتاج إلى مساعدة في أعمال المنزل؟ لدينا أكثر من 35 خدمة منزلية لمساعدتك في التعامل مع قائمة مهامك، بدءاً من خدمات التنظيف المنزلي والصيانة وخدمات الصالون وسبا إلى الغسيل وغسيل السيارات.
 

انضم إلى حلقة من التوفير بلا حدود مع Smiles Unlimited. احصل على توصيل مجاني على طلبات الأكل والبقالة، وبدون رسوم خدمة على حجز الخدمات المنزلية وعروض اشترِ 1 واحصل على 1 مجاناً بلا حدود.
 

قم بتحميل تطبيق Smiles الآن وابدأ رحلة التوفير.

The HAC Halal Index mobile application for Sri Lanka.

The Halal Assessment Council (Guarantee) Limited, (HAC), is the only entity certifying and conducting professional and internationally accepted compliance audits for Halal standards in Sri Lanka. HAC has launched the new upgraded version of its mobile application which provides easy access, at the touch of your fingertips, to find HAC Halal certified products.

The launch of this Mobile Application is an outcome of HAC’s policy of continuous improvements to its services.

We invite you to install, review and send us your valuable feedback to info@hac.lk

Order meals and snacks from your favourite local and national restaurants, or get groceries, essentials and alcohol delivered to your door.
New users get 30% off your first 3 orders. T&C apply: New users only. Expires 30 days from new user’s first DoorDash order. Valid at participating stores only. 1 redemption per user for each category; national chain, local and grocery (3 in total). Max $20 discount per order. Fees apply.
YOUR FAVOURITE RESTAURANTS
Explore a wide variety of cuisines and get your meals faster with quick and easy ordering. From your local noodle place to your daily coffee fix to your go-to comfort food, find your favourites on DoorDash. National partners include McDonald's, Pizza Hut, Hungry Jack's, Subway, Domino's, KFC, Subway, Taco Bell, Nando's, Oporto, Grill'd, Sushi Sushi, Zambrero and more.
GROCERIES AND CONVENIENCE
Order from your local Coles, IGA or 7-Eleven and have thousands of items delivered when you need them. Top up the pantry, grab last-minute ingredients, stock up on snacks to share with mates or cool down with a slurpee. Get your groceries and everyday essentials delivered with DoorDash.
SUBSCRIBE TO DASHPASS AND SAVE
With a DashPass subscription, enjoy unlimited deliveries and pay $0 delivery fees at DashPass merchants (min. spend applies), plus get access to special offers from local restaurants.
DELIVERY OR PICKUP?
Get what you need straight to your door, schedule delivery for when it's most convenient for you, or order ahead with pickup for a fast and easy takeaway.
NO-CONTACT DELIVERY
Deliveries are left at your door, unless you choose "Hand it to me" when ordering. For contactless deliveries, your Dasher will leave your food in a safe place and let you know it's ready.
TRACK YOUR ORDER
Real-time tracking lets you see when your order will arrive. We've factored in food prep and handling times, traffic, weather and more so you'll know exactly when to set the table.
CONVENIENT PAYMENT
Pay with Apple Pay, credit or debit card, PayPal or Afterpay.
ABOUT DOORDASH
DoorDash is a technology company that connects people with the best in their cities. Since 2013, we've been building products and services to empower local businesses and in turn, generate new ways for people to earn, work and live.

Snoonu

Snoonu is an online app offering the fastest shopping & delivery services in Qatar, with a variety of restaurants, groceries, retail stores options, and more. 
 
Food Delivery

With Snoonu eating becomes easy - explore restaurant options and order food delivery in just a few clicks.
Find the best deals for fast food delivery like pizza from Papa John’s, Pizza Hut, or Yellow Cab; burgers from McDonald’s, fried chicken from Al Baik, Jollibee, KFC, or sandwiches from Subway.
Snoonu has partnered with thousands of restaurants in Qatar, so we can satisfy your cravings for different cuisines like Japanese, Italian, Filipino, Indian, Kuwaiti, Iranian, Lebanese, healthy, Mexican, vegetarian, seafood and much more. All you need to do? Download the Snoonu app and boost your food mood.
 
Snoonu aims to make your life easier. Get your groceries essentials delivered to your step at no time. Forget about going to a store, staying in line, and carrying heavy bags. Snoonu has your grocery list in one place. Whether you prefer to get your fresh vegetables, meats, and bakery at Almeera, Megamart, SPAR, or Snoomart, you can quickly get your weekly grocery shopping list added to your cart, and check out with any convenient payment method. Snoonu has added Apple Pay as payment option to make your checkout experience even smoother. 
 
Online Shopping

Snoonu is not just an online food delivery app, Snoonu provides you with the online shopping options for pharmacies, electronics, kids toys, flower shops, or any other Qatar retail store you can think about. 
With Snoonu, you can:
Order medication and vitamins from the nearest pharmacy
Surprise your loved ones with flowers or chocolate for any special occasion
Get your kids toys, books, and school supplies without spending hours at the malls
Find the latest releases of electronics and video games 
Plan your weekend adventures and book it online
Snoosend - point-to-point delivery service
 
“Snoosend'' - a new in-app category, enables you to send packages from one location to another within Qatar. You can find the “Snoosend” feature on the home page, place a delivery, select a “from” and “to” locations, write a description of the items, and proceed to check out.


WHY USE Snoonu App?
·     Fastest 24/7 delivery service in Qatar
·     Great offers and discounts
·     Exclusive selection of restaurants and retail stores
·     Online shopping needs all in one place
·     Easy in-app navigation and check-out experience
·     Friendly and responsive customer service team
 
With Snoonu you can:

·     Order fast delivery from anywhere in Qatar
·     Discover local stores, shop online, and get same-day delivery
·     Have 24/7 delivery
·     Track your delivery in real-time
·     Modify your delivery instructions and contact drivers
·     Securely store multiple payment methods
·     Pay by cash or with Apple Pay, Visa, Mastercard
·     Save and name different delivery addresses
·     Rate your experience
·     Find your previous orders and reorder with just a tap
 
Don’t Miss Our Special Deals
Find exclusive deals, discounts, and vouchers by downloading the App. 
Snoonu Red Deals offer a variety of exclusive free delivery and % off deals for food and retail stores options. 
Sign up with your email and phone number and receive special promotions and vouchers.
 
TALK TO US!
We value your feedback and we’ll do anything to make your Snoonu experience exceptional. If you need any help, please contact our customer service at customer.support@snoonu.com

Learn more about Snoonu:                 
·   Our site: https://www.snoonu.com
·   Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/snoonu.qa/
·   Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/snoonu/
·   Twitter: https://twitter.com/snoonu_qa
DOWNLOAD NOW – Enjoy the Fastest Delivery in Qatar!

Blinkit is India’s last minute app. Trusted by millions, it is your everyday online grocery shopping app that home-delivers 10,000+ daily groceries in just a blink. Buy milk products, fresh fruits & vegetables, daily grocery, kitchen, home & office items by shopping for them online on Blinkit. Enjoy easy and smooth app experience with quick delivery.

- Best price and quality fresh fruits & vegetables
- Milk, curd, bread, butter, eggs, cheese, paneer & other daily grocery
- Snacks, biscuits, chips, ice cream, chocolates
- Cold drinks, ice, bottle opener
- Atta, rice, dal, oil, masalas, noodles
- Personal care, detergent, cleaning supplies
- Diapers & baby care
- Pet food
- Bulbs, batteries, mobile chargers
- Emergency medicines, thermometer
- Kitchen tools like chopper, blender, grinder
- Puja needs
- Stationery
- Smart watches, LED lights, Headphones



Beauty & skincare store
Makeup, luxury beauty brands & everyday skincare – now on Blinkit! Shop a huge range of authentic makeup, bath & body, hair care products, beauty accessories & much more!

Electronics store
Wireless or bluetooth earphones? Check. Smart watches? Yes. LED lights? Absolutely! Shop affordable and latest electronics online at best prices, only on Blinkit.

Safe and quick grocery delivery app
The average driving speed for Blinkit (formerly Grofers) delivery agents is 20kmph, since we have a grocery delivery store located every 2 km to instantly serve you.

Many safe payment options
Do your grocery shopping online on Blinkit & pay safely and securely for your groceries with UPI, COD or cards / wallets / netbanking / buy now pay later. We accept Sodexo meal pass and Paytm food wallet too.

Authentic phone accessories
We don’t want you to wait for the most premium and authentic phone accessories out there – which is why you can get them in minutes on Blinkit.

Printouts delivered in minutes
With Blinkit, you can get a printout of anything delivered in just minutes. With convenient options of both black & white and coloured prints, get all your documents sorted instantly!

Low prices, amazing offers
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) offers you big discounts and savings on daily grocery, bundles and bank offers. We give the best prices on online groceries with our monthly House Full Sale!

Live order tracking & helpful customer support
Track your grocery order online, right from your payment being confirmed to the delivery of your groceries. In case you need help, simply tap & chat with our customer support executives who are always ready to assist you.

Delivering groceries in 20+ cities
Instantly do your grocery shopping online! Get delivery of milk, vegetables, bread, snacks & more on the Blinkit app in Ahmedabad, Bengaluru, Chandigarh, Chennai, Delhi, Faridabad, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Jaipur, Jalandhar, Kanpur, Kolkata, Lucknow, Ludhiana, Meerut, Mohali, Mumbai, Panchkula, Pune, Noida, Ghaziabad, Vadodara & Zirakpur.

Huge variety of local & international brands
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) grocery delivery app has a huge variety of shopping brands available online, including local specialities. In fact, Blinkit has brands you won’t find anywhere else. You can get delivery of daily grocery, festival special products, and even gourmet and international foods! Get the latest products from leading brands like boAt, The Wishing Chair, Ekam, MasterChow, The Body Shop, Farmley, Engage, The Whole Truth, The Moms Co, SuperBottoms, Tropicana, Nestle, Coca Cola, Lay’s, Harvest, Ferrero, Toblerone, Oreo, Nutella, Starbucks, Clinique, Kama Ayurveda, L'Occitane, Innisfree, Davidoff, Rage Coffee, Lindt, Starbucks, Blue Tokai, Sleepy Owl, Wingreens Farms, Bagrry's, Gunsberg, Jade Forest, Jimmy's Cocktails, Eveready, Nivea, Garnier, Lakmé, Haldiram's, Bikano, Heinz, Vahdam, Dettol, Cadbury, ITC, Colgate Palmolive, PepsiCo, Durex, Licious, Aashirvaad, Saffola, Patanjali, Fortune, 24 Mantra, TGL Co., Nestle, Amul, Dabur, & many more.

Enjoy your favorite restaurants and stores, all in one place.
The Wolt app makes it easy to discover and order (almost) anything from your city. From delicious food and fresh groceries to pharmacy and pet supplies. Search by category, cuisine, restaurant or item! You can easily browse popular restaurants including McDonald's, KFC, Domino's, Pizza Hut, Papa Johns, Burger King and many more. Enjoy food delivery of burgers, pizza, sushi and other delicious items. If you prefer, you can pick up your order from the restaurant or store!

Order (almost) anything, on-demand.
Need to stock up on groceries? Can’t make it to the city? Wolt has you covered with groceries and essentials at your fingertips. Browse through the categories on Wolt and order anything, from pharmacy items to pet supplies. Anything you need, we’ve got you covered with our 40 000+ restaurants and stores. 

Top offers, only on Wolt.
Discover great offers on food, groceries and more! Browse hand-picked deals in the Wolt app and enjoy great savings. There’s offers on everything from food and groceries to electronics and homewares. Find the freshest deals in the app, including up to 50% off your order and €0 delivery fees!


Subscribe to Wolt+
If you’re looking for even bigger savings, Wolt+ is our popular subscription service offering €0 delivery fees, plus much more. As a Wolt+ member, you’ll unlock unbeatable deals and exclusive perks.

Make every occasion special with Wolt
We’ve made it easy to order and enjoy whatever you need. Get gifts for your loved ones, schedule orders for groceries and food, and save with deals on clothing and more! Wolt has you covered with everything to make moments special. Browse the selection of lovely flowers, chocolates, baked treats and more – delivered to your door in one hour or less.

Double Order
Need to order groceries and dinner? Now you can! Combine two local venues in one order with the same delivery fee. Place a Double Order and enjoy more convenience, for less!

Track every step
With every order, you can enjoy real-time tracking, and a minute-by-minute countdown. Whether you keep an eye on the tracker, or have other things to do, we'll keep you notified, so you know when your order is about to arrive.

Customer support
If something doesn’t go as planned, we’re ready to help – with customer support available 24/7. Our friendly team is there to help the 25+ countries we operate in and are ready to respond in seconds.

Payment
We think ordering Wolt should be as simple as possible. That’s why you can pay conveniently and securely with your credit card or Apple Pay. Whatever works for you.

Life simplified. Joy delivered. 
Wolt is currently available in 170+ cities located in Azerbaijan, Croatia, Cyprus, Czechia, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Israel, Japan, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Malta, Norway, Poland,  Serbia,  Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden. More are added all the time! Download Now and Unlock Essentials at your fingertips.

Wolt is an Editors’ Choice! 
Recognized by Apple as a top-rated app, Wolt delivers more than just food. Enjoy a seamless experience, from browsing our curated selection of restaurants to tracking your order in real-time.

app_name: Pizza Hut UAE- Order Food Now
description:
Pizza Hut is one of the best fast-food restaurants in the UAE. Find amazing deals & offers on our app and get them delivered to your doorstep. Indulge yourself with veg and non-veg array of pizzas, pastas, drinks, desserts & more all from the comfort of your home!

Order pizza online from our improved Pizza Hut UAE App Store app and get a pizza that is both delicious and value for money.


We are committed to make every customer experience safe and we are ready to serve amazing pizza deals and offers, at your doorstep with our 100% contactless delivery.



*PizzaHut UAE app takes ordering to the next level, follow just a few steps:


1. Download the Pizza Hut UAE App

2. Choose a preferred mode of language

3. Check your favorite items from easy to navigate menu

4. Add your favorite food to your cart

5. Easy Login to use saved addresses or continue as Guest

6. Pick your preferred mode of ordering as takeaway or delivery

7. Select location and provide a delivery address

8. Hassle free proceed to check out and make the payment

9. Track your order and get it delivered at lightning-fast delivery

10. Time to enjoy the food delivered at your doorstep.


Why you should use the Pizza Hut UAE Apple Store App -


My Orders:

We have bookmarked all your orders, so you don’t end up spending time repeating your previous orders. Get special deals on Pizza Hut’s app with your order today.


My Favorites:

We know your love for pizza, so we have added this place to store all your favorites.


My Account:


Why spend time on multiple apps when a single app can sort you in many ways. Follow our login process which now can be done via social mode. Use your Google or Facebook or Apple account to log in with ease.


Exclusive Pizza Hut UAE Menu:

Order from a wide range of Pizza Hut’s double cheese pizza, mushroom meals, chicken pizza, vegan and veg pizza & much more. Do not forget to look for our Sides & Desserts section.

Language:

Choose your preferred language between English and Arabic and place your favorite order.

Order Status:

Check current order status - in preparation, cooking or out for delivery.

Pickup or Takeaway:

Order your favorite pizza, pasta or any other food items on our app and get easy pickup & takeaway option

Special offers:

Pizza Hut UAE provides you with various offers. Do checkout it and avail a lot of benefits.

Find Pizza Hut:

Find your nearest Pizza Hut UAE, on our food app or pickup your amazing pizza offers and deals.


Need Help?

Pizza Hut UAE's customer care is happy to help you! Call us at 600564999 For more details, please log into https://uae.pizzahut.me/en/home2

McDonald's Official App for Japan
The McDonald's official app offers not only daily coupons and latest information but also allows you to complete your order and payment seamlessly.



Features Available:
• Access to the Latest Coupons
Enjoy exclusive coupons that can be used in-store or through mobile orders. Show the coupon number to the staff by selecting "Use in Store" or choose a coupon from the mobile order menu category.
• Check McDonald’s Menu
Access detailed information about McDonald's products, including ingredients, allergy information, and nutritional content.
• Discover the Latest News
Find recommended news and products tailored to you right on the home screen.
• Order and pay via the App with Mobile Order
You can complete your order and payment entirely through the app. Skip the line and receive your food directly at your table (not available in certain restaurants or hours).
• Order from home and have your meal delivered by McDelivery® Service via the App.



How to Use Mobile Order:
Step 1: Log In
To use coupons or place an order, you need to register and log in. If you've forgotten your password, you can reset it via the "Forgot Password" option. Please ensure that you can receive emails from info@nsp.mdj.jp.
Step 2: Choose a Restaurant
Select the restaurant where you would like to receive your order. Please check the available restaurants in the app.
Step 3: Select Your Menu
Choose your favorite menu items. Coupons can also be used. Please note that some coupons available for mobile orders may differ from those available at the Front Counter.
Step 4: Choose Your Pickup Method
Select from table delivery (table service), counter pickup, takeout, park & go, or Drive-Thru. Pickup options may vary by restaurant and time. Table service, park & go, and drive-thru are not available at all locations.
Step 5: Choose Your Payment Method
You can pay with a credit card (VISA, Master, JCB, Diners, American Express), d-Barai, PayPay, Rakuten Pay, au PAY, LINE Pay, or Apple Pay .
Please Complete the Following Step After Arriving at the Restaurant
Step 6: Receive Your Order
Once you arrive at the restaurant, confirm your payment to start the preparation of your order. Enjoy your freshly prepared food.



How to Use McDelivery® Service:
Step 1: Log In
To place an order, you need to register and log in. If you've forgotten your password, you can reset it via the "Forgot Password" option. Please ensure that you can receive emails from info@nsp.mdj.jp.
Step 2: Select Delivery Address and Time
Choose whether you want to order now or reserve a delivery time. Reservations can be made from one day to two hours prior to the desired delivery time.
Step 3: Select Your Menu
Choose your favorite menu items.
Step 4: Choose Your Payment Method
You can pay with cash, credit card (VISA, Master, JCB, Diners, American Express), d-barai, PayPay, Rakuten Pay, au PAY, LINE Pay, or Apple Pay . Please note that cash payments are not available at some locations.
Step 5: Receive Your Order
Our delivery staff will bring your freshly prepared meal to your specified address. If you prefer a no-contact delivery, you can select the "Leave at the Door" option when ordering.
• Please note:
  • Delivery times vary by location.
  • Orders for the breakfast menu must be placed by 10:20 AM.
  • Minimum order value is ¥1,500 (¥1,000 for breakfast).
  • A delivery fee of ¥300 applies.

Daily deals & discounts tailored for you.

HungerStation Plus: unlimited free delivery from over 35,000 restaurants, stores, and pharmacies.

How to order? Just 4 easy steps:

What makes us stand out?
Track your order step by step until it arrives.
Smart filters and search help you find the best restaurants and deals.
Real customer reviews to guide your choice.
24/7 customer support.
Schedule your order and get it delivered at the time that suits you.

New to HungerStation?
Enjoy a full year of unlimited free delivery from over 35,000 restaurants and stores as soon as you sign up.

HungerStation is more than just an app! It’s your shortcut to saving time and effort. Order in a few taps and rest assured, everything will arrive quickly and with quality.

Download HungerStation now.


HungerStation Before Everyone.

Your most loved Kentucky Fried Chicken fast food restaurant comes online. Indulgence made easy with our online food delivery app. Call for some tempting Chicken Zinger burger and sandwiches from your favorite Kentucky restaurant and avail some amazing burger deals and offers. Pick up the food or get it delivered at your doorstep. Your meal is just as delicious and as safe as ever with our 100% contactless delivery.  Enjoy online food ordering and get the latest Kentucky fried chicken deals! 
At KFC Qatar, we serve the best crispy chicken strips and twister burgers as we believe in freshly prepared good food and premium quality. Our aim is to take convenience to a whole new level and want you to have your favorite KFC Chicken burger available, right at the comfort of your home.
KFC understands the current situations and the need to be home and safe. It is time to relish incoming food from the best burger restaurant. Call now on our KFC contact numbers or download our KFC deals app today. 

*KFC app takes ordering to the next level, follow just a few steps:         
1. Download the app,
2. Choose a preferred mode of language,
3. Check your favorite items from easy to navigate menu,
4. Add goodness to your cart,
5. Hassle free Log in to use Saved Addresses or continue as Guest,
6. Choose your preferred mode of ordering as pickup or delivery,
7. Select location and provide a delivery address/pickup address,
8. Easy Proceed to check out and make payment,
9. Track your order and get it delivered at lightning-fast delivery,
10. Time to enjoy the food delivered at your doorstep. 

Why you should use KFC App:

*Pickup or Takeaway: 
While you are out and about in the city, pickup your delicious food from any nearest KFC Qatar restaurant by ordering from the food delivery application.   

*Smart Car Hop:
Experience 100% Contactless and hassle-free Car Hop services. For our customers we bring the safest contactless delivery for your car parked in our premises.

*Mid night delivery: 
Bookmark our KFC Qatar app for all the late night cravings. Have a look at our KFC menu & we’ll rush to you with delicious chicken items even at Midnight. This is available at select locations only.

*My account:
Why spend time on multiple apps when a single app can sort you in many ways.  Follow our login process which now can be done via social mode. Use your Google or Facebook or Apple account to login with ease.

*Hassle-free payments:
With multiple payment options (including Cash on Delivery, Online payments like Credit/Debit Cards etc.) at your fingertips, it’s now easier than ever to pay for your order. 

*Exclusive KFC Menu: Order from the wide range of - KFC bucket meals, Wraps, Zinger box meals, twister burgers, Chicken Dinner combos, Combos for one or for sharing, Filler sandwiches and much more. Don’t forget to look for our crispy chicken strips and more options from our Sides & Desserts section. 

*Amazing KFC Offers:
Coupons, Offers & deals customized only for you so that it leaves you wanting for more. Get special rewards on the KFC deals app with your order. 
 
*Have any feedback or queries?
KFC’s customer care is happy to help you! Call us at 44410410 or drop a mail anytime to apps@americana-food.com
For more details, please log into https://www.qatar.kfc.me/

Yelp has over 135 million reviews of businesses worldwide. Whether you’re looking for a new pizza place to try, a great coffee shop nearby, or need to book a haircut, Yelp is your local guide for finding the perfect place to eat, shop, drink, explore, and relax. The Yelp app is available for iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch.

Yelp features:

Food Near You - Find Restaurants
• Find the newest and hottest restaurants in your area
• Make reservations, order delivery or pickup—all from your phone
• Filter restaurant search results by price, location, open now, and more

Search for Nearby Businesses, Services, & Professionals
• Discover great local businesses, from hair salons to trusted doctors and movers
• Read millions of reviews by the Yelp community
• Home need repairs? Find the best rated contractors and handymen
• Find great deals offered by local businesses, get quotes instantly, and book appointments

Beauty - Pamper Yourself 
• Find highly-rated salons, spas, massage therapists, and more
• Book appointments through Yelp at the most relaxing staycation destinations

Search Filters 
• Filter your search results by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, and hours of operation
• Look up addresses and phone numbers, call a business, or make reservations directly from the app

Other Features
• Read expert user reviews and browse through beautiful photos of each business
• Write and read reviews, check-in to local businesses, upload photos and add tips for other Yelp users

Find local restaurants, read expert customer reviews, and start searching for businesses near you with Yelp. 

Need Help? Contact Yelp at https://www.yelp-support.com/?l=en_CA
Note: Continued use of GPS running can dramatically decrease battery life.

description:
Discover the local choice for meals, groceries, and food delivery with foodpanda!

Life can get overwhelming, but we’re here to help! Whether you need daily meals, groceries, or shopping essentials, foodpanda has got you covered with convenient food delivery.

Order Your Favourite Food with Just 3 Simple Taps!

With foodpanda, you can easily choose the food you love, and we’ll deliver it right to your door. Serving millions across over 400 cities in 11 Asian markets — Singapore, Hong Kong, Thailand, Malaysia, Pakistan, Taiwan, the Philippines, Bangladesh, Laos, Cambodia, and Myanmar — foodpanda is your go-to for everyday food delivery.

Endless Food and Grocery Delivery Choices at Your Fingertips!
Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or fried chicken? We know the best restaurants near you – big famous brands and tiny local faves. Best part? We've got exclusive discounts and promos waiting for all new foodies. With a simple click, your food and groceries are on their way with fast delivery!

Need Groceries? We’ve Got You Covered!
Want to cook but short on time? Imagine having fresh produce, pantry staples, frozen goods, personal care items, your cute pets' needs, and much more, delivered in a flash — everything you need for a hassle-free home-cooked meal, all available through our speedy groceries delivery service from foodpanda shops and pandamarts.

Best Food and Grocery Delivery Deals Just for You!
Looking for the best savings on groceries and food? We regularly update our daily deals, personalised just for you! Here’s a tip: skip the queue and choose self pick-up for extra savings on your grocery orders, or enjoy the convenience of our food delivery options.

Save on tasty takeaways.
On the go? Try pick-up! Skip the queue and save up when you self-collect your order.

Worry-free package delivery.
Need to send or receive a parcel? Go with pandago. Our reliable fleet and on-demand delivery service will safely deliver it for you in no time.

Our tech is shaped by you.
Explore personalised offers and delicious picks just for you. Dish out what you feel about your order and let foodies know what’s yum. 

Want More? Join pandapro!
Unlock even greater savings on food delivery and grocery options with our pandapro membership today!

Live like a panda and let us take care of the rest — let’s do it the panda way with seamless food delivery!

For more info, please visit our website.

Get your favorite spirits, wines, and more delivered straight to your doorstep in record time with CityDrinks, the premier alcohol delivery service in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain Emirates, UAE. Experience our unmatched delivery speed as we bring you a wide selection of products, including bar accessories, glassware, cocktail ingredients, gourmet foods, snacks, liquors, ciders, brandy, gin, tequila & mezcal, vodka, rum, whiskey, beer, wine & champagnes, and an extensive range of other alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages from renowned brands worldwide.

Convenience is our top priority. Never worry about running dry during your special occasions, cozy evenings, or vibrant parties again. CityDrinks ensures that your favorite drinks are just a few moments away, delivered straight to your doorstep.

Key Features:

Lightning-Fast Delivery: Experience the thrill of instant gratification with our swift delivery service. We guarantee same-day delivery within a minimum timeframe of 20 minutes, depending on your location. No more waiting anxiously—your drinks are just moments away!

Live Tracking: Stay informed throughout the delivery process with our real-time tracking feature. Know exactly where your order is and when it will arrive, allowing you to plan accordingly and never miss a beat.

Schedule Your Delivery: Busy schedule? No problem. CityDrinks understands the value of time management. You can effortlessly schedule your delivery for a specific date and time that suits your convenience. We'll make sure your chosen beverages arrive precisely when you need them.

Effortless Payment Options: We believe in hassle-free transactions. Pay for your order seamlessly using the app's secure payment gateway or opt for cash on delivery—whichever method suits you best.

Favorite Brands:

Discover an extensive range of beloved brands, carefully curated to satisfy every palate. Some of our popular brands include:

Liquors: Absolut, Jack Daniel's, Hennessy, Baileys
Beers: Heineken, Corona, Guinness, Stella Artois
Wines: Moët & Chandon, Penfolds, Château Margaux, Santa Margherita
Spirits: Tanqueray, Don Julio, Glenfiddich, Johnnie Walker
And many more to explore!

Note: Age Verification

Please note that to place an order with CityDrinks, customers must be at least 21 years of age as per UAE law. We take responsible drinking seriously and strictly adhere to legal regulations.

Contact Information:

For further inquiries or assistance, please reach out to us at info@citydrinks.com. Our dedicated customer support team is here to assist you.

Download the CityDrinks app now and unlock a world of premium beverages at your fingertips. Cheers to convenience and enjoyment with CityDrinks, your trusted alcohol delivery service in Abu Dhabi and Al Ain Emirates.
